website_summaries.verdict: Compact storage and most of the essentials for auto emergencies are highlights of this kit, but lack of safety reflectors is concerning.
pros: Compact and easily stored away until needed
Contains most of the basics needed for roadside emergencies
cons: Numerous reports that kit is missing listed items on arrival
Jumper cable clamps barely fit battery terminals
No reflective warning triangle or flares

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS KIT!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews for this and it sounded like the biggest problem was that the number of items in the kit was misleading. I bought two, one for each car. Then my battery died and I tried to jumpstart the car. THE CABLES MELTED, and in the process damaged my car. I bought these because they were advertised as AAA approved. I will be contacting both AAA and Amazon about reparation for what turned out to be a very bad - and expensive! - buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sara B. Slaymaker

customer_reviews.title: Shame on AAA!
customer_reviews.text: AAA should be ashamed of themselves to put their logo on this thing. 24 of the 42 pieces are the first aid kit (bandaids))! One of the 42 pieces is a baggie (seriously?) I have attached a photo of the contents. I returned it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Very misleading packaging/marketing
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the small print. 42 pieces includes (3) pieces for the batteries that go into the flashlight, A plastic ziplock bag that they placed items in counts as a piece. They supply 5 plastic tie straps each counting as piece, (2) forms (AAA brochure and Accident Form) that were not even there each count as pieces, etc etc. Once you put it all together you really have 8 pieces. Long time AAA customer and very disappointed in the manner this was marketed. That having been said, I did not drill down into the details so buyer beware I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: 1st grade

customer_reviews.title: Wasted Money...
customer_reviews.text: I have been punked, they are joking with me right? There were not 42 pieces in the bag, even after I counted the plastic bags they put the items in and I'm sure they did too, it was still not 42 pieces. There were clearly items missing, no orange vest, no 3 bandages, no fuses, no AAA car care guide, no AAA membership brochure, no shop cloth, and AAA storage bag. Everything is cheaply made, cheaper than the Dollar Store material. I’m returning this and will just purchase another kit from somewhere else or put my own kit together. Very disappointed in this one, but oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Yon

customer_reviews.title: a super cheapo china made flashlight
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I should have read what was in it more, it's just some jumper cables, a super cheapo china made flashlight, a poncho and zip ties, and like 3 Band-Aids, seriously. Not worth the price tag at all, could make your own for less than $10. But hey, free cheapo batteries included, guises they got that goin for them,
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Be careful, they might burn you.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in May to hv in my car incase of an emergency. Well tried using when I finally needed them. I have to say I'm very disappointed. They didn't do the job they are supposed to do. And to top it off, when I tried to remove the cable from the battery. It burned the hell out of me. The rubber smelled like it was burning. Unfortunately I cant return them, since it's been three months.
customer_reviews.author: Edna

customer_reviews.title: We purchased this kit for son's first car. His ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this kit for son's first car. His battery died, and we opened the kit to use the jumper cables (the main reason we gave it to him). The cables are short, but that is not an issue if you park the cars nose-to-nose. HOWEVER, the cables do not open wide enough to clamp around the battery posts in order to jump start the car. We had to call AAA to send someone to jump the battery for us. I will be returning the entire kit.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: The jumper cables too short; vehicles would need to be bumper to bumper. The other items looks like dollar store junk. Put together your own kit and you'll spend less and have better items. Don't waste your money on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Sogoli

customer_reviews.title: Purchased by accident but ended up happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I ended up with this by accident; my cat stepped on my tablet and hit the buy with one click option. By time I realized it, it was too late to cancel the purchase. I had been looking for something to keep in the truck just in case but hadn't decided what to buy. The kit looks to be very complete and the case is sturdy and compact so it fits perfectly behind the seat in my standard cab truck. There is enough room that I can put some additional items in it and keep everything in one place. I think it will be handy to have if I ever need it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One was good,  one was bad
customer_reviews.text: This is what i recieved today...broken, burned and useless. It was wrapped and sealed with the inspected and repackaged seal...really??!!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Powell

customer_reviews.title: kinda cheap.
customer_reviews.text: I received the order on time and in good shape . But when opened it was obvious that I would be disappointed. The main Item , The jumper cables were about 5 ft. long . Way to short to be much help . A good set of jumper cables should be at least 8 ft. . But nice bag to put some basic tools ,rags , duct tape and other helpful side of the road stuff . Overall just go ahead and spend another 10-15 dollars and get the real stuff . 2 stars .
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing several parts
customer_reviews.text: Missing the AAA car care guide, AAA brochure, reflective vest, fuses, and the "first aid kit" is definitely disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP QUALITY!! Spend your money on your own kit!
customer_reviews.text: It sounds nice to have an all-in-one kit (Jumper cables/First Aid/etc...); however, wow are these cheaply made. I understand the cost effectiveness for these Made in China items, but you rather spend the money on getting these items separately. You just don't want to be cheap on first aid and jumper cables!
customer_reviews.author: Bobsun Dugnutt

customer_reviews.title: but this is still great. It has everything you need in it
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully I have never had to use this yet, and hopefully will never have to, but this is still great. It has everything you need in it. It’s also pretty compact so it doesn’t take up a lot of space in your car. I have a small Toyota Corolla so trunk space is pretty limited and this being in there does not hinder my ability to fit a lot of stuff in my trunk. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost a complete roadside emergency kit.
customer_reviews.text: This kit is almost complete. The only thing missing is a triangle safety reflector. Other than that, the flashlight is very small but extremely bright for its size. (And it comes with batteries). The jumper cables are heaver gauge then I expected. The first aide kit is just some band-aids and disinfectant. Still a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ted C. in MD

customer_reviews.title: Every car should have an Emergency Kit
customer_reviews.text: Good start for an emergency kit- I made this purchase for my son who is turning sixteen. I looked over many bags and read many reviews. I chose this one for it's reviews, contents and the AAA brand. It has a lot of emergency supplies needed and they are made of good quality. I am slowly putting in more supplies I find might be helpful. Window center-punch, gloves, flashing emergency light, road triangles. I have also put survival gear in it, a compass, an emergency blanket, a whistle, hand warmers, a knife, etc... Buying this bag for the price and adding is better than overpaying for a larger emergency bag that contains more supplies but not really "useful" supplies.
customer_reviews.author: Montana

customer_reviews.title: This product is garbage. Shame on AAA for allowing branding.
customer_reviews.text: These reviews seriously need to be investigated and no longer relying on them as of this specific product. This entire kit is garbage and zero respect for AAA for allowing their name on it. Everything from the bag, to the cables, to the flashlight are complete and utter garbage.
customer_reviews.author: gb_ott

customer_reviews.title: Cables are not properly sized.
customer_reviews.text: Had a friend whose battery died in the car. Tried to jump the car and the cables in the kit are too small to fit the car battery connections. AAA showed up and jumped the car right away. A true failure.
customer_reviews.author: Delaino L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: A gift for our Granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: We gave this emergency road kit to our 19-year-old granddaughter. As you know, a 19-year-old would never think to have an emergency kit because after all, they will never have an emergency!!! I feel a little better knowing that when she does have an emergency, she will be prepared.
customer_reviews.author: INDYreads67

customer_reviews.title: Not a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I would select no stars but thats not an option. I do not suggest using the jumper cables out of this kit unless you want to fry your hands as well as the cables. I tried jumping my battery and these cables immediately starting smoking and melting forcing me to burn my hands to remove them from the batteries right away. The cables were used correctly so that was not the issue, they are crap cables.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Mandatory gift
customer_reviews.text: Put it to use for the first time 2 months after buying it, and it worked just fine. Did exactly what you need it to do. Not the LONGEST jump starter, take note. But it does the job if you can position your car with whoever you’re helping vise versa.
customer_reviews.author: Doug S.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of stuff in a small box
customer_reviews.text: New car, new accessories. This kit seems to be the best bang for the buck out there although fortunately I haven’t had to use any of the pieces. Take the inner cardboard out of the storage case and it fits easily with your spare.
customer_reviews.author: LO

customer_reviews.title: Skimpy.  Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Skimpy and cheap. Not a lot there. I would not buy again. No emergency equipment like reflective road markers.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanna

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of $$$
customer_reviews.text: There were several items missing. No reflective vest or fuses no brochure packet or safety car guide and a couple of other things. The flash light came with batteries but it's such a piece of sh*t the batteries don't even fit in it lol I'm not going to be returning it because it's just more hassle than it's worth. The jumper cables I'm sure (hope) will come in handy. But they definitely shorted my bag badly.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Williams

customer_reviews.title: jumper cables dont work
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for - this is a very cheap set. The jumper cables don't work. Really stinks because we didn't discover this until we needed them last week. Luckily, someone else had a different set of cables that did work. We threw the cables away.
customer_reviews.author: valerie

customer_reviews.title: Bad jumper cables
customer_reviews.text: The plastic coating on the jumper cables started melting almost instantly after the car was started. Unfortunately we missed the return window by 1 month.
customer_reviews.author: Mary R

customer_reviews.title: Great for a new driver as a safety gift
customer_reviews.text: Has everything that a driver may need. The bag isn't too big and is easy to spot in the red case. It would be great if there were little velcro "antislip" pieces on the bottom so that you could make it stick to the inside of the trunk area without hearing it slide everywhere. It's too big to put under the seat but may be able to squeeze in near the spare tire if you car offers that much space.
customer_reviews.author: KDB Educator

customer_reviews.title: Very functional emergency kit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson who recently obtained his very first car. The items in the kit seemed to be sturdy. I feel better just knowing that he will at lease have a few emergency items just in case.
customer_reviews.author: txrray

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit with plenty of supplies. Reasonably priced. However, the jumper cables were apparently sub-standard since when he used them the first time, the plastic coating MELTED. Honestly, the only thing I really wanted were the jumper cables. I should have purchased them separately and gotten a better quality set. All things considered, it's an OK set; maybe we just had a bad set of cables.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend you research a little more prior to purchasing this ...
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend you research a little more prior to purchasing this kit. There are far better options out there for just a couple of extra hard earned dollars. The jumper cables are excellent due to the gauge size, but the rest of what is provided is laughable. For a few dollars you can get enough items for a much more substantial and more complete first aid kit. A couple of band aids and a cream or two doesn't even match what should be kept in a kit like this for emergencies. Look a bit more as there are so many other available and better options.
customer_reviews.author: Diver jay

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son as a Christmas present. It’s the perfect gift idea for anyone! It has everything you can imagine! I need to buy one for myself! I love how everything needed is right inside the kit!
customer_reviews.author: Julie T.

customer_reviews.title: Fine for the money
customer_reviews.text: Since I purchased the low end version of this, I didn't expect much. The 42 piece thing is sort of silly since about 3/4 of it is band-aids. I pretty much just wanted it for the jumper cables so it's fine, but I would say the count of pieces included is kind of a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Karina S

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for myself and for gifting to my children after my battery died and I had nothing in my car to help me. This is a must have for anyone at all but especially for your kids. No one should be stranded on the side of the road.
customer_reviews.author: LTama64

customer_reviews.title: Excellent All in One Kit
customer_reviews.text: Excellent road side emergency kit. Everything needed is included and takes up very little space. Every vehicle should have one. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Skipper

customer_reviews.title: As good as my usual brand
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my sons sad vehicle when I was unable to find a just-in case set, like the one I bought for my other son four years previous, I am not disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Stacia Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift given and she loved it
customer_reviews.text: Friend has a 15+ old car. She needed this just in case. Gave as part of gift for birthday so not 100 sure of contents. But she loved it
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Wound not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Cheap product I tried to jump a battery that was slightly dead. No luck. I borrowed a passerby cables which were thicker cables my truck stated 1-2-3. What good are jumping cables when they are to thin
customer_reviews.author: Lori G

customer_reviews.title: It's a good buy
customer_reviews.text: It's cute n practical hubby liked it. Jumper works just fine n we have a SUV a ford explorer. I thought it came with the glow stick n vest but it must have been another one
customer_reviews.author: Kerese green

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality cables
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. Cables are cheap and melted on first use. Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Jim Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Okay product.
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay. Wish they put longer jumper cables in these sets. Also I added a can of fix a flat to it (there was room in the bag for it) and gave as a gift to my 16 year old nephew.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Snell

customer_reviews.title: A useful value!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the jumper cables which I have used many times and still have. I like the zippered pouch it comes in, it has stood the test of time. This alone makes it worth it for me. As for the rest of the "gear" it's pretty cheapo but I keep it anyway, overall it is a great and useful value, I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: GeoffreyM

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift, but not impressive
customer_reviews.text: Not very impressive--a lot of the "pieces" are individual bandaids. So you're really paying for a nice bag, light-duty jumper cables, and an inexpensive first aid kit. It's tidy all in once piece in the trunk, but you could compile the parts individually just as easily.
customer_reviews.author: Praiser2002

customer_reviews.title: It's such a great thing to have in every car
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mother for Christmas, she loves it!!! It's such a great thing to have in every car! You really never know what will happen and this has almost anything you may need to help you out. Yes we all have cell phones now a days but some places lack service so god forbid you get stuck somewhere with no service this would be amazing to have on you. I will be ordering a second one for my self.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Something everyone needs
customer_reviews.text: Not sure of the rating as I gave it as a gift but I thought it was a good gift for a good price
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Silkwood

customer_reviews.title: Great tool bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! Everything works great I’ve used this multiple times and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Alldredge

customer_reviews.title: Get some good jumper cables
customer_reviews.text: More of an advertisement to get a AAA membership. Get some good jumper cables, duct tape, and some basic tools instead of wasting your money.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander P.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product, not too bulky and nice to have in your car. It's a good, and inexpensive emergency kit for your car. In the age of cell phones it's a nice kit to have to get you through temporary car issues.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Randle

customer_reviews.title: Great for a new car driver
customer_reviews.text: Great for a new car driver. Teach them what each piece does and how it’s used.
customer_reviews.author: Awesome Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Item as Described
customer_reviews.text: We get these for our vehicles. Its perfect because its an all inclusive emergency kit. Item as described, will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Great kit!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! This kit comes with everything that a girl could need. I definitely feel prepared now if something were to happen.
customer_reviews.author: Aubs

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs one
customer_reviews.text: Grandson just got his first car, important that he is prepared if something happens
customer_reviews.author: Dell's

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my dad as a gift, it's smaller than I thought. It's packed tightly so I can imagine it getting messy after you unpack it/use something.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product to have in your trunk. You never know what will happen
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Good road trip product
customer_reviews.text: Going on a road trip and this has all these necessary items you might need on a road trip - also great gift idea!
customer_reviews.author: Katie4

customer_reviews.title: Thoughtful gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought for teen son, now just ordered another set for teen daughters car
customer_reviews.author: Crissy

customer_reviews.title: Not safe to use
customer_reviews.text: My son used the cables for the first time and they melted. Very dangerous. I bought 5 of this kit as Christmas gifts for my family and know I'm not sure they are safe to use.
customer_reviews.author: Trae

customer_reviews.title: Dollar Store gift bag
customer_reviews.text: Have you ever wanted to pay more for stuff you can buy at the dollar store but have it branded by the AAA. Also, 4 of the "emergency roadside" things are just brochures for joining the AAA. 2 stars only because the bag is nice so U can go to the store and buy more ACTUAL things you might need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived as described. This will make a perfect gift for the new driver in the family!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Any car owner should have one of these in their car.
customer_reviews.author: Nash

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described! Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Came with everything as described! Love that it comes in a kit that I can just keep in my car.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: put in the trunk for a new teenage driver. Exactly what you need in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: Not expected quality
customer_reviews.text: Not very good quality. Gave to my daughter. Very cheap
customer_reviews.author: Sara K. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice
customer_reviews.text: New SUV, new stocking for the "trunk." Never had a car kit like this but decided it's a good thing to keep on hand, just in case. Price was right and everything you'd need for a roadside emergency is right there. Glad I have it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bag is made well. Contents seem sturdy enough though haven’t had to use them yet. Glad to know it’s in my car truck in case I need.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Ok kit
customer_reviews.text: Not much of a first aid kit. Basically a nice bag and jumper cables.
customer_reviews.author: Tpoythress

customer_reviews.title: Cables too short
customer_reviews.text: So we bought this because I was worried about my battery ever dying. Unfortunately it has now come to that point but the jumper cables are too short to even reach! So now we have to buy a separate set of cables. Our car is stuck in the garage and it doesn’t reach the battery of the other car. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L.

customer_reviews.title: Premium?
customer_reviews.text: In what world would this ever be considered a "premium" emergency kit? The answer...apparentally this one. I dont know how, it consists of jumper cables, flashlight, screw driver and some bandaids. There's better cases for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good for the money.The cables aren't really that good.But I guess they are alright I bought it for our daughter,and threw in some other tools as well.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Tavano

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed with this misleading information
customer_reviews.text: Not as described, I have been with AAA for over 20years, very disappointed with this misleading information, there are not 42 pieces, and many items missing, only good thing was there is plenty of room left over in the bag so you can add your own items.
customer_reviews.author: supes

customer_reviews.title: Basic emergency kit
customer_reviews.text: This is good to have in your car, in case Auto Club isn't available.
customer_reviews.author: Masaba

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have, good gift!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Nice bag to have handy in the trunk.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Have only used the jumper cables and haven’t had any issues with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifed

customer_reviews.title: worth it
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money to have this. I have it my car just in case of an emergency. Better to be safe than sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Anabel Kohlmeier

customer_reviews.title: Aaa on the road baby!!!
customer_reviews.text: I finally stop being lazy and got the essential kit to have in any vehicle you own. I can give jumps and receive jumps. I have a handy first aid that will come in handy one day. Im just so happy to have this kit when i take road trips.
customer_reviews.author: choc

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Already had to use, my mom got it for me when I got my license and my own vehicle....jumper cables work great and the other items have come in handy not just for breakdowns but also for maybe a hiking trip.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this road kit
customer_reviews.text: I am very please with the kit and how it is put together. You get everything you need in case of a road emergency. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: booker5

customer_reviews.title: Will do in an emergency.
customer_reviews.text: Really read what is included. I didn't read through fully and was surprised when these mini jumper cables came included instead of standard cables. I imagine if you read the description and still decide to order, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Me Likey
customer_reviews.text: I had to use the jumper cables on my neighbor's car and it worked like a charm. Great buy for less.
customer_reviews.author: Breon

customer_reviews.title: A must have in your car/truck!
customer_reviews.text: I recently had some car trouble, and you wouldn't believe how many people don't carry jumber cables! So i bought this kit. It does it's job and has a bag to keep it all in place. Definitely recommend buying one for your vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Amaya

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared in case you're stranded.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had to use it yet but it's a solid kit and makes me feel a little more secure when I brave the snowy roads. I travel between Pittsburgh and Michigan a lot and the "Cleveland Corridor" as I call it gets very dangerous sometimes on I-80 with lake effect and high winds. I have 4x4 but that doesn't mean I won't get stranded. This, plus a few extras, makes me feel prepared.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be a kit with lots of items for the just in case scenario. Have not had to use it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Kubly

customer_reviews.title: Bwa ha ha
customer_reviews.text: A great Christmas gift, though it may make your friends'/relatives' kids cry when they realize it's just a boring, yet functional car safety kit for emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Packer

customer_reviews.title: Great emergency road side case!
customer_reviews.text: Was very pleased with this it arrived rather quickly! Great item to carry in your car! I would recommend to family and friends!
customer_reviews.author: Melonie

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Luckily I haven't had to use this yet! Glad my car is still good but these are great quality and are good for a pinch!
customer_reviews.author: katrina puga

customer_reviews.title: Good to have something...
customer_reviews.text: It has the basics although the jumper cables a short and flimsy they would work in a pinch, the flash light is weak and the fuses are for older vehicles, the poncho is a 1 time use and the orange vest is childs size. The 3 bandages is almost an insult I suppose if you scrape your knuckle or skin you knee it may make sense. For 24 bucks dont expect much.
customer_reviews.author: Bitwave

customer_reviews.title: Great kit!
customer_reviews.text: A great essential to go in your car. It has everything you need and it’s all good quality. A must have!
customer_reviews.author: K & C

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable price, guality okay.
customer_reviews.text: My wife’s car just turned 5 years old, I’ve always carried one in my vehicle so I just thought she should have something.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald D.

customer_reviews.title: Safety
customer_reviews.text: I love this item it has so much in it and I've since added more items great for a woman to have in her car
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, gave as a gift. Female Friend loved it
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I feel better knowing she has this in her car. I got one for each of my girls and they are doing great with it. Haven't needed it yet but it's nice knowing they have something.
customer_reviews.author: David Ortman

customer_reviews.title: Seems high quality, haven’t needed it yet
customer_reviews.text: Good basic kit that’s eveyone should keep in they’re cars. Hopefully I won’t need to use it.
customer_reviews.author: JarivLetap

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the just in case car pack
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the just in case car pack. Everyone should have cables, and for this price its not gonna break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Bought it as an emergency kit for new car, ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as an emergency kit for new car, but have used it twice to help others. Worth it knowing it is there and it works.
customer_reviews.author: Wes Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great Basic Kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a good starter kit for any car. The first aid kit is pretty simplistic so I had to supplement it with some additional supplies. Nothing that you cannot get out of your medicine cabinet. Other then that for the price this is well worth the purchase. More expensive kits might have a few more pieces but nothing worth the increased price.
customer_reviews.author: Review King

customer_reviews.title: Good basic kit
customer_reviews.text: Good basic kit. The cables are a little short but they get the job done in a pinch. We used it about 1 week after it arrived to jump a dead car.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for a friend - thankfully she hasn't ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend - thankfully she hasn't needed to use it yet, but it thankful she has it for those just in case times. The kit comes with a ton of stuff - I looked it over and the quality is okay and fits in a neat pack.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product for Teens
customer_reviews.text: Great kit for my daughters new car. Had to add a few minor things but nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Nickb2

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking everything you want
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice nice product got it for my granddaughter
customer_reviews.author: larry

customer_reviews.title: Has all Items!
customer_reviews.text: The big still has enough to place 1st aid kit in it as well.

customer_reviews.title: I needed it
customer_reviews.text: I still have this in my car handy for a single woman

product_meta.title: Lifeline AAA Premium Road Kit, 42 Piece Emergency Car Kit with Jumper Cables, Flashlight and First Aid Kit
product_meta.description: As the exclusive licensee of the AAA brand for roadside emergency safety kits, first aid kits and auto safety accessories, you know that you are getting only the finest products. AAA, one of the most recognizable and trusted names in the automotive industry, has been around for more than 100 years and is dedicated to helping travelers with roadside assistance, travel services and more. All of the components within our AAA line of auto emergency safety kits and accessories must meet minimum standards set forth by AAA engineering department, and before going to market undergo strict testing requirements to ensure the safety of the product, as well as the ability to live up to its promises. We have created a wide range of road kits, first aid kits, and auto safety accessories, to help meet the safety and preparedness needs of travelers across a wide range of price points. The AAA branded Premium Road Kit contains 42 components to help keep you prepared for those unforeseeable events ranging from finding your car with a dead battery, or needing a flashlight to look in those dark places under the seats to try and find your kids favorite dinosaur toy. The 4330AAA, AAA Premium Road Kit Contains; Carry Case, 8 foot 8 gauge jumper cables, Aluminum Flashlight and batteries, 2-in-1 screwdriver, Duct Tape, Emergency Poncho, Shop Cloth 5 cable ties, 20 bandages, 4 towelettes, reusable zipper lock bag, AAA Membership Brochure, AAA Accident Guidelines
